text: The Executive Commission of 1848 was a short-lived government during the French Second Republic. It was chaired by Fran√ßois Arago. It lasted from 9 May 1848 to 24 June 1848. It replaced the Provisional Government of 1848 and was in turn replaced by the Cabinet of General Cavaignac. The members of the Commission acted as joint head of state. ==References== Category:Government of France Category:1848 establishments
title: French Executive Commission (1848)
